post.title: Visual State Manager
post.content: I've been doing some work with Silverlight 2 bets 2's new Visual State Manager. You can do this in Xaml or in Blend I've been doing them in both. The best tutorial's I've seen have came from Microsoft's Karen Corby. I also plan to work with the Visual Studio shell which will produce another product by December, when Sphinx Logic launches.
